item.title: Best practices for ensuring diversity of presenters at OHBM
item.description: Check out our OHBM blog post about “Best practices for ensuring diversity of presenters at OHBM” published in December 1, 2022! https://www.ohbmbrainmappingblog.com/blog/best-practices-for-ensuring-diversity-of-presenters-at-ohbm

item.title: Diversity and Inclusivity Events at the 2022 OHBM Annual Meeting
item.description: Check out our latest OHBM post that reviews the events hosted by OHBM DIC in the annual meeting of OHBM published in May 27, 2022! https://www.ohbmbrainmappingblog.com/blog/diversity-inclusivity-events-at-the-2022-ohbm-annual-meeting-if-you-want-to-go-far-go-together

item.title: Results from the Survey on Inclusivity at OHBM - Summary and Future Directions
item.description: We collected and analyzed the results from our survey on inclusivity at OHBM. Check out our summary and suggested future directions. https://www.ohbmbrainmappingblog.com/blog/results-from-the-survey-on-inclusivity-at-ohbm-summary-and-future-directions

item.title: The First Post
